alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Grady; McClain; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 10:14PM CDT until April 23 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... South central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1014 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Bray, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pauls Valley, Lindsay, Maysville, Bray, Elmore City, Wayne, Foster, Antioch, Cox City, Whitebead and Erin Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
